complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Setup Rust project foundation and dependencies
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Basic project initialization with well-defined dependencies. Straightforward setup with clear steps and minimal technical challenges.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Setup PostgreSQL database schema and migrations
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down database schema creation into separate migration files for each table, index optimization tasks, and constraint validation steps.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity due to multiple interconnected tables, foreign key relationships, and performance considerations with indexes. Requires careful schema design.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate into connection pool setup, individual model creation for each entity, repository pattern implementation, and error handling configuration.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Higher complexity due to connection pool management, model mapping, repository pattern implementation, and proper error handling across multiple database entities.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Setup Redis connection and caching layer
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split into Redis connection setup, session storage implementation, and rate limiting storage with TTL management.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity with Redis connection management, session storage design, and rate limiting implementation requiring careful TTL handling.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into JWT token generation, validation middleware, refresh token management, password hashing, session storage, and security configuration.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to security considerations, token lifecycle management, middleware integration, and proper handling of refresh tokens with Redis storage.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate OAuth2 client configuration, authorization flow handlers for each provider, callback endpoint implementation, user account linking, and JWT integration.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to OAuth2 flow implementation, multiple provider integration, account linking logic, and security considerations for external authentication.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split into sliding window algorithm implementation, Redis counter management, middleware integration, and response header configuration.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate-high complexity requiring efficient algorithm implementation, Redis operations optimization, and proper middleware integration with different user types.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into individual CRUD endpoints, role-based authorization middleware, invitation system, member management, and validation logic.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to role-based authorization, invitation system with expiration, multiple endpoints with different permission levels, and team member management.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate into individual CRUD endpoints, filtering and query parameter handling, soft delete implementation, validation logic, cleanup job scheduling, and status management.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to comprehensive CRUD operations, complex filtering logic, soft delete with cleanup jobs, and status enum validation across multiple endpoints.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Setup WebSocket infrastructure for real-time updates
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into WebSocket endpoint setup, connection pool management, authentication handling, Redis pub/sub integration, connection lifecycle management, heartbeat implementation, and scalability optimization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Very high complexity due to WebSocket connection management, Redis pub/sub for scaling, authentication integration, and handling 1000 concurrent connections with proper lifecycle management.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate into notification service design, WebSocket integration, email service setup, push notification configuration, user preferences management, Redis queue implementation, background worker creation, and notification type handling.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Very high complexity involving multiple notification channels (WebSocket, email, push), queue management, background processing, user preferences, and integration with external services.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split into logging configuration, metrics collection setup, Prometheus endpoint implementation, and middleware integration for request tracing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity requiring proper logging structure, metrics collection, Prometheus integration, and trace ID management across requests.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into liveness endpoint, readiness endpoint with dependency checks, and graceful shutdown handling.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity with dependency health checks, timeout handling, and proper Kubernetes integration requirements.
Basic React project setup with well-established tooling. Straightforward configuration with minimal technical challenges.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement authentication UI and API integration
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate into AuthContext setup, login/register forms, OAuth2 UI integration, token management, protected routes, and API client configuration.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate-high complexity due to state management, form validation, OAuth2 integration, token refresh logic, and route protection implementation.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Build Kanban board UI with drag-and-drop
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into Kanban board layout, drag-and-drop implementation, task card components, API integration, filtering functionality, and optimistic updates.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to drag-and-drop implementation, real-time updates, optimistic UI updates, and complex state management for task movements.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate into team settings UI, member management interface, invitation system UI, role-based permissions, team switching, and activity feed.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate-high complexity due to role-based UI rendering, invitation system, member management, and multiple interconnected components.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Add WebSocket integration and real-time updates
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into WebSocket hook creation, real-time update integration, connection management, reconnection logic, notification system, and presence indicators.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to WebSocket connection management, real-time state synchronization, reconnection logic, and integration with existing UI components.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Create Docker containerization and Kubernetes manifests
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate into Rust API Dockerfile, React frontend Dockerfile, docker-compose setup, Kubernetes manifests, HPA configuration, and persistent volume setup.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to multi-stage builds, Kubernetes configuration, auto-scaling setup, and proper production deployment considerations.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into data export endpoint, data deletion implementation, audit logging, retention policy enforcement, consent management, and privacy policy tracking.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to legal compliance requirements, data anonymization, audit trails, and comprehensive data handling across the entire system.
